transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello, good morning, Noor ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ji, ji.
Customer: Noor ji main Rista baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se, kaise hai aap?
Executive: Ji badhiya, thank you.
Executive: Ji boliye.
Executive: Okay, haan.
Executive: Aapka ek, aapki ek request aayi thi ki aapko apne account manager se baat karna hai.
Customer: Ji, ji, account manager jo handle kar raha hai.
Executive: Haan, Chetan ki details nahi hai aapke paas mein? Chetan aapka account handle karta hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi mere paas Chetan ka details nahi hai, bahut pehle message kiya tha, I think mere paas number bhi shayad hoga nahi.
Executive: Toh Chetan ka number nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi hoga toh woh message kiya tha, phir number ka text message toh yeh tha, number save bhi nahi hai na mere paas.
Executive: Okay. Toh main aapko Chetan ka number de deti hu, aap please usko note down kariye, whenever aapko koi help ki zarurat ya koi assistance ki zarurat padti hai, aap please unko contact kar sakte hai. Dusri cheez mujhe ek cheez jaanni thi, hamare paas mobile number jo updated hai yaha par, woh ek mein last mein, ek number 87 se shuru hai, 86, 736 pe khatam hai aur dusra 90 se shuru hai aur woh bhi 736 pe khatam hai.
Customer: Last kya hai, last kya hai? 736 hoga ek.
Executive: Yes, yes. Aapka number maine yaha pe manually enter kiya hai, matlab.
Customer: Ji, ji. 953 hoga ek.
Executive: Nahi, number ek start from 87 se hai aur ek 90 se hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Toh aapka number kaunsa hai inme se?
Customer: Dekhiye woh do do mere bhai ka hai aur jo mera 8354 hai, starting ka.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Woh mera number hai, woh mera number hai.
Executive: Lekin yeh number aapka hamare paas updated nahi hai, yeh reason ho sakta hai ki Chetan aap se contact nahi kar paate ho.
Customer: Okay okay, toh please aap add kar sakte hai woh number. Nahi nahi add hai, maine dekha tha apne IndiaMART account par.
Executive: Ek second. Last mein dekhiye 953 hoga.
Executive: Okay, hamare paas na do tarike, ek toh number hota hai jisme aapko buyer ke calls aate hai na, PNS number mein. Waha pe aapka number enter hai, waha pe aapke paas IndiaMART ke buyers ke calls aapke paas aate hai, aapke account manager ke calls aapke paas nahi aate hai kyunki aapka number hamare paas yeh updated nahi hai.
Customer: Okay. Toh yeh hamare paas do number updated hai.
Customer: Yeh hame update karna padega.
Executive: Haan, yeh aapko add karna padega apna number kyunki yaha pe jo primary aur secondary number hai, hum focus karte hai ki hum unhi par baat kare. Alag se third number enter karke woh baat karne ka jo logic hai woh abhi mana hai.
Customer: Okay. Toh agar aap chahte hai ki aapki is, haan.
Customer: Toh aap mein Chetan ji ka number mere paas send kar dijiye, main unse contact kar leta hu aage.
Executive: Chetan aaj chutti par hai, aaj leave par hai Chetan toh aaj available nahi hai isliye main aap se contact kar rahi hu toh main Chetan kal available honge, aap main unhe bol deti hu ki woh aapko message kar denge, theek hai? Whenever woh available honge woh aapko contact kar lenge. Dusri cheez mujhe do category thi hamare paas jo add hai abhi currently.
Customer: Okay. Theek hai? Woh dono category aap mujhe bataiye aap deal karte hai kya? Yeh shag, shagrag koi category hai, isme dealing karte hai kya aap?
Customer: Shagrag, yes, karte hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: But kabhi yeh leads jab nahi aate toh consume karna padta hai mujhe. Kyunki main is par zyada work nahi karta. Matlab jab related mujhse relevant lead nahi aate, woh nahi aate leads mere paas, toh mujhe yeh leads consume karna padta hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Kyunki main toh zyada deal hand toh karte hai na, deal toh karte hai na, product toh hai na aapka.
Executive: Deal toh karte hai. Ji, ji, kyunki main zyada karta hu. Ji sure add kar dijiye, main toh hand tufted aur hand knotted ka yeh zyada karta hu, yeh sab.
Executive: Toh shagrag ka koi aur bhi koi hamare paas isse related koi aur product aapka category add hai pehle se ya mujhe naya add karna padega isko?
Customer: Naya add karna padega.
Executive: New add karna padega. Ji.
Customer: Ab mere paas aap ek baar check karenge toh mere IndiaMART par ek leads jo mere mere se related nahi aate hai. Jitne bhi aate hai, micro fiber aate hai, flooring carpet yeh PVC sab yeh sab aate hai, yeh sab mein toh main deal hi nahi karta na. Ek non woven ho gaya yeh sab.
Executive: Main woh dekh leti hu, aap mujhe bataiye shagrag aur shag carpet dono ek hi cheez hai?
Customer: Yes, dono ek hi cheez hai.
Executive: Theek hai, maine dono add kar diye hai, iske photos lagenge aap photos share kar dijiyega hum usko update kar denge, theek hai? Haan aap bataiye kaisi leads aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Mere matlab relevant leads nahi aa rahe hai. Jaise non woven ho gaya, micro fiber ho gaya aur kuch din se mere paas achche leads aa hi nahi rahe hai fresh.
Executive: Okay, room carpet mein deal karte hai abhi aap?
Customer: Kis cheez mein?
Executive: Room carpet.
Customer: Room carpet mein karte hai par woh room carpet ka woh rehta hai tab PVC mein aa jata hai na woh material PVC mein chala jata hai yeh sab chala jata hai toh kaha usme deal karte hai hum log PVC mein. Hum log pure handmade mein karte hai deal.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Dekhiye maine hand knotted carpet search kiya hai, theek hai? Ek requirement Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh se aayi hui hai. Yeh apne near ka near ka koi near ka apne koi woh add hi nahi karte hum log.
Customer: Matlab aap Uttar Pradesh nahi dekhte hai?
Customer: Uttar Pradesh mein dekh dekhte hai, Uttar Pradesh ka nahi karte hum log.
Customer: Kyunki zyada tar hum log Delhi aur Mumbai ka hi mera woh target rehta hai.
Executive: Achcha agar kisi lead kisi buylead ke aage nahi likha hua hai ki usko waha pe handmade ki requirement hai, toh aap kaise identify karte hai ki handmade ho sakta hai ya nahi hai? Bas us pe likha hua hai jaise yeh vinyl flooring sheet ki requirement hai. Vinyl flooring hai and vinyl flooring sheet unhone dala hua hai, 600 square feet hai. 2 mm hai.
Customer: Toh yeh sab iski PVC rehta hai, PVC vinyl haan vinyl aap search karenge Google pe yeh sab PVC mein chala jata hai. Bas is is wajah se hum log isko consume nahi karte hai lead ko.
Executive: Toh aap ek do ek kaam kijiyega, aap ek do leads ko na vinyl wali ko not relevant mark kar dijiyega ki aap is category mein deal nahi karte hai so that aane wale time mein aapka jo screen hai waha se yeh leads thodi si hat jaaye.
Customer: Okay. Theek hai? Operation theater conductive vinyl flooring, anti static flooring. Ab mere paas na fresh leads aa rahe hai, main teen din se isme fasa hua hu, unhone koi lead aa raha hai toh main usme aage kya karu?
Customer: Mere paas leads bhi toh aani chahiye.
Executive: Dekhiye agar main leads check karu yaha pe, toh leads toh mujhe fresh dikh rahi hai aapki screen pe. Abhi jo fresh hai woh mere se related hone chahiye na, jo fresh hai woh mere related hone chahiye na mere leads se. Jo jis mein product se main deal kar raha hu. Jo relevant hai, jo leads relevant hai, unko hatane ka maine aapko tarika bata diya hai. Aap ek baar login kar lijiye apna panel, main aapko bata deti hu ki aap woh not relevant mark kaise karna hai.
Customer: Okay, woh toh main samajh gaya not relevant wala.
Executive: Nahi aap kar dijiye usko phir kar dijiye so that hum log accordingly kar le usko. Aap isko mark kar dijiye.
Customer: Okay, main kar deta hu, kuch time dijiyega main kar dunga usko.
Executive: Theek hai. Iske sath mein dekhiye aapne kaha ki aap jo hai jitne bhi product mein deal karte hai woh zyada tar handmade hai sare, theek hai?
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Toh handmade bhi maine filter laga ke dekha hai toh abhi kuch leads dikh rahi hai, kuch ki order value kam hai. Agar aap apni category ko search karke dekhenge toh mujhe lagta hai ki dikhenge leads. Jaise maine search kiya hai printed carpets. Sirf printed carpets hai, usme nahi likha hua hai ki woh handmade hai ya kaise hai.
Customer: Yeh dekho ek requirement aayi hai, rotary printed carpet hai apna product kya hai yeh?
Customer: Printed carpets hai par woh toh printed carpet usme chala jata hai na jo tent mein wedding mein lagate hai mat, usme chala jata hai.
Executive: Toh aapka woh wala nahi hai?
Customer: Isme nahi rehta. Nahi nahi woh wala nahi hai mera, mera handmade rehta hai.
Customer: Main handmade carpets yeh sab search karu toh mujhe aata hi nahi na jaldi mere mein.
Executive: Sir dekhiye agar kisi ne printed carpet search product ki requirement apni post ki hai, theek hai? Buyleads ke through post ki hai apne printed carpet ki.
Customer: Okay. Toh woh bahut explain karke agar batayenge ki mujhe handmade chahiye toh woh aayega agar kisi ko printed mujhe chahiye maine printed carpet search kiya aur maine jaake ek do product dekhe hai aur maine printed carpet search karke apne buylead post kar diya. Ab jitne bhi sellers hai jo printed carpet mein deal karte hai woh sab mujhse contact karenge. Ab mujhe handmade chahiye ya machine se bana hua chahiye woh ho sakta hai main baad mein discussion ke baad mein aap se baat karke batau.
Customer: Okay. Hai na? Kyunki jab maine search kiya hai printed carpet toh yaha pe ek requirement jo dikh rahi hai mujhe yeh aayi hui hai Maharashtra se, unhone sirf printed carpet dala hua hai yaha pe. Unhe business use ke liye unhe kaunsa room carpet chahiye printed hai. Ab jab tak aap inse baat nahi karenge aapko pata nahi chalega ki inko kaunsa chahiye.
Customer: Yahi rehta hai na ki woh log leads galat dalte hai phir hame bhi apna leads woh karana padta hai na, mera bhi chala jata hai leads.
Executive: Kyunki dekhiye aksar yeh hamare paas bedsheet, baby soft mat, printed pillow covers sab hamare paas se kharidte hai aksar.
Customer: Okay. Theek hai toh aap dekh lijiye uska ek baar aap. Phir main yaha se dekhta hu apna kuch.
Executive: Nahi koi issues nahi hai main aapko abhi main Chetan se kehti hu ki woh aapko WhatsApp pe message kar de, theek hai? Toh aap accordingly coordinate kar lijiyega Chetan se. Dusri cheez ek hamare paas iske alawa sir kuch aur bhi hai jo jaanna hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi nahi all okay hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh iske sath se ek aapka ek concern open tha mere paas mein, theek hai? Main usko close kar deti hu. In case aapko koi help chahiye ho toh aap mujhe ya phir Chetan ko contact kar sakte hai direct, theek hai?
Customer: Okay sir, okay.
Executive: Okay, thank you sir.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to talk to account manager.

- Not getting relevant buyleads.

- Wants to update primary number.



Resolution:

- Provided Chetan's number.

- Added shagrag and shag carpet category.

- Explained how to mark leads as not relevant.

- Will ask Chetan to message the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will mark irrelevant leads.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account manager, update number, categories
